sys_dictionary.default_value: We propose a challenging and rewarding position as leader of one of the most important units for the Digital Transformation of the Commission. The daily work will cover 2 wide areas of our business, from Payment Office Support to digitally transforming Policy Making, as well as technical matters like supporting legacy systems, implementing innovative solutions employing Al, Data Mining, etc. This broad areas of responsibility comes with management of a significant team and budget. This requires the job holder to operate both at operational and at highly strategic level Operational, the unit is responsible for the day to day support of solutions used by the institutions staff and pensioners as well as externally facing solutions and services used by Member States (like the internal Market Information System). It is also responsible for the European public (.9 European Citizens Initiative or the Single Digital Gateway)
sys_dictionary.name: x_431105_cand_ass_assessment
